health_critical: Emergency Room Co-pay | You earned just enough to pay for the ER. Get up, your anus is screaming.
Hemorrhoid Surgery Fund | Keep squatting, the doctor misses you.
Leg Amputation Risk | Can't feel your legs? That's because they're dead.
health_warning: Donut Cushion | You'll need this to sit at your desk tomorrow.
Toilet Seat Imprint (Permanent) | Your butt has fused with the toilet seat.
Boss's Suspicion | Gone so long, your boss thinks you're mining crypto in the bathroom.
wealth_micro: Boss's CO2 | You stole a breath of air from the company. This is the beginning of revenge.
Static Electricity | You took nothing but friction.
Void | Form is emptiness, emptiness is salary.
wealth_tiny: Toilet Paper (2 sheets) | Company thanks you for helping deplete inventory.
Copy Paper (1 sheet) | Fold it into a paper airplane, you earned it.
Paperclip | Good for poking the reset button, otherwise useless.
Pen Ink (0.5cc) | Every grain counts. Squat a thousand more times to buy a whole pen.
wealth_low: Convenience Store Tea Egg | Protein is the foundation of revolution. Watch your cholesterol.
Yakult | Drink it, promote digestion, start the next alchemy cycle.
Instant Noodles | Crush it like you're crushing your boss's dreams.
Plastic Bag ($0.07) | What are you putting in it? Your salary.
wealth_mid_low: Iced Milk Tea (with pearls) | The price of the breakfast shop auntie calling you handsome.
Fried Chicken (uncut) | It's expensive now, but you traded poop for it.
Netflix Basic Plan | Watch shows at work, double alchemy, double happiness.
Bubble Tea (less sugar, less ice) | This is the blood pack for corporate slaves.
wealth_mid: Chicken Leg Bento (with egg) | You earned today's lunch money in the bathroom.
Taxi Base Fare | Escape this company now, just go.
Movie Ticket (matinee) | Pretend to meet a client, actually meeting Tom Cruise.
Cheap Bluetooth Earbuds | Can't hear the boss's nonsense = good earbuds.
wealth_high: High-Speed Rail Ticket (non-reserved) | Enough to escape to another city and start over.
Massage Voucher (30 min) | Your shoulders are stiff, but your life is stiffer.
Gacha Pull (one 10-pull) | Thanks boss for sponsoring your gacha money.
Premium Steak (business lunch) | Eating better than the boss, that's winning.
wealth_ultra: Boss's Blood Pressure Meds | You made the company stock drop 0.00001%.
Ergonomic Chair (with headrest) | If you're going to prison, at least sit comfortably.
Therapy Session (1 hour) | You need more than money, you need a doctor.
wealth_legendary: Philosopher's Stone (Kidney Stone) | Are you sure you're okay in there? Should I call an ambulance?
Company Ownership (0.01%) | Congrats, you're a shareholder now.
Breath of Freedom | What you earned isn't money, it's dignity.
